propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
propColor: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.
propComponent:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDisabled: If `true`, the label should be displayed in a disabled state.
propError: If `true`, the label should be displayed in an error state.
propFilled: If `true`, the label should use filled classes key.
propFocused: If `true`, the input of this label is focused (used by `FormGroup` components).
propRequired: If `true`, the label will indicate that the input is required.
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesColorSecondary: Styles applied to the root element if the color is secondary.
stylesFocused: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `focused={true}`.
stylesDisabled: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `disabled={true}`.
stylesError: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `error={true}`.
stylesFilled: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `filled={true}`.
stylesRequired: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `required={true}`.
stylesAsterisk: Styles applied to the asterisk element.
